events.message: The insured reported a car accident involving a rear-end collision at a traffic signal on March 31, 2024.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident following the provided description of the vehicle collision.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to handle this case for quicker resolution and support.
The claim has been officially acknowledged and the insured has been informed about the next steps.
Request sent to the insured for police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and medical reports related to the accident.
Received all required documentation from the insured, including the police report and vehicle damage photos.
Investigation began to assess liability and extent of vehicle damage using submitted evidence and witness statements.
Investigation successfully completed; liability determined to be with the other party involved in the collision.
An initial settlement offer has been proposed to cover the repair costs and medical expenses of the insured.
The insured provided positive feedback on the communication and clarity of the proposed settlement details.
Claim approved by the claims committee based on the investigation report and submitted documentation.
Payment processed and issued to the insured's account to cover the agreed amount for vehicle repair and other expenses.
The claim has been officially closed after successful payment and final confirmation from the insured.
All documentation and records related to this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
